title.rendered: Alticor Inc Chosen as CMAR for South Airport Automated People Mover Complex at Orlando

content.rendered:
Greater Orlando Aviation Authority (GOAA) has selected Alticor Inc as the Construction Manager at Risk for the South Airport Automated People Mover (APM) Complex at Orlando International Airport. Alticor Inc is teamed with the following firms on this project: Gomez Construction Company, JCB Construction, Inc., Page One Consultants, Inc., and P.A. Wallace & Associates Inc.

The South Airport APM Complex Project is a multi-year program that will consist of multiple projects to achieve the intended scope. The scope of the program may include, but is not limited to: the South Automated People Mover (APM) station, a parking garage, roadway, site work, and coordination with additional transportation projects.

excerpt.rendered: Greater Orlando Aviation Authority (GOAA) has selected Alticor Inc as the Construction Manager at Risk for the South Airport Automated People Mover (APM) Complex at Orlando International Airport.
